title: Help !
descriptions: Welcome on this card search engine for Magic : The Gathering.
This is mobile version of magic-card-search.com.
This search engine contains all card until the last extension Theros.
It has been made for simple and powerful search thanks to :

texts.title: Text search
descriptions: All cards has been indexed in English. For French people, card title is also available in French.
Text search can search words contained in all card text content (title, description, type...).
Text search works with full words. For example, searching elf enchantment returns all cards where text content contains elf AND enchantment.

texts.title: Character *
descriptions: Character * can be used for searching partial words, for example :
items: searching lo*us returns card containing words lotus and locus.
searching emra* returns cards beginning with emra like Emrakul.

texts.title: Character "
descriptions: Character " searchs a text block. For example, searching "add three mana" returns cards containing this text block like Black Lotus, Lotus Vale, Gilded Lotus...

texts.title: Facets
descriptions: Facets are filters that can be applied and cumulated for searching.
For instance, a facet can filter on card color. By selecting blue from Color facet, search results is filtered to display only blue cards.
Filters can be added from the same facet or another one. When selecting green, search results are again filtered to display only blue and green cards.
Also, by selecting creature from Type facet, search results are again filtered to display only blue and green creatures.
Number between parenthesis at right of a facet is the number of results of this facet. This number is dynamic and relates to current search.
For example, when there are no search filter nor text search, 1 in facet Converted mana cost indicates 1612. It means that 1612 cards with CMC 1.
With previous search (blue/green/creature), the same filter in facet indicates 2. It means that only 2 cards exists with CMC 1 : Bioshift, Slippery Boggle.

texts.title: Color
descriptions: Filters search results based on card color :
items: White / Blue / Black / Red / Green : filter based on color
Uncolored / Gold / 1 color / ... / 5 colors : filter based on colors number
Guild : relates to symbols
Life : relates to symbols

texts.title: Devotion
descriptions: Filters search results based on devotion value. Devotion for a card color is calculated on number of mana symbol in casting cost.
For instance, Abhorrent Overlord has 2 in devotion for black :

texts.title: Converted mana cost (CMC)
descriptions: Filters seach results based on CMC : card casting cost mana sum.
For instance, Abhorrent Overlord has 7 for CMC :
